sections.title: Swashbuckler (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Swashbuckler class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Swashbuckler)
sections.description: Swashbucklers are proficient with simple and martial weapons, light armor, and bucklers.

sections.title: Panache (Ex) (Swashbuckler)
sections.description: A resource pool equal to Charisma modifier that fuels deeds, regained by critical hits and killing blows with light or one-handed piercing melee weapons.

sections.title: Deeds (Swashbuckler)
sections.description: Special abilities powered by panache points, ranging from skill bonuses to combat maneuvers, with effects scaling by level.

sections.title: Deeds of Renown (Swashbuckler)
sections.description: Optional replacement deeds that provide alternative abilities, including samurai resolve integration and specialized combat techniques.

sections.title: Swashbuckler Finesse (Ex) (Swashbuckler)
sections.description: Grants Weapon Finesse with light or one-handed piercing melee weapons and allows Charisma to replace Intelligence for combat feat prerequisites.

sections.title: Charmed Life (Ex) (Swashbuckler)
sections.description: Allows adding Charisma modifier to saving throws a limited number of times per day as an immediate action.

sections.title: Nimble (Ex) (Swashbuckler)
sections.description: Provides a scaling dodge bonus to AC while wearing light or no armor, lost when Dexterity bonus to AC is lost.

sections.title: Bonus Feats (Swashbuckler)
sections.description: Grants bonus combat feats every 4 levels starting at 4th, with swashbuckler levels counting as fighter levels for prerequisites.

sections.title: Swashbuckler Weapon Training (Ex) (Swashbuckler)
sections.description: Provides scaling attack and damage bonuses with light or one-handed piercing melee weapons plus Improved Critical feat benefit.

sections.title: Swashbuckler Weapon Mastery (Ex) (Swashbuckler)
sections.description: Automatically confirms critical threats and increases critical multipliers with light or one-handed piercing melee weapons.

sections.title: Incredible Luck (Ex) (Swashbuckler)
sections.description: Grants three additional uses of charmed life and allows activation as a free action, even outside of turn.
